sqlMap.select: SELECT mem.id, cash.delete_cash, cash.cashuse_date, buy.pay_name, buy.pay_benefit, buy.download_count FROM bbu_member mem, bbu_cashuse cash, bbu_buyinfo buy WHERE mem.id = #id# and cash.cash_id = #id# and buy.buy_id = #id# GROUP BY mem.id, cash.delete_cash, cash.cashuse_date, buy.pay_name, buy.pay_benefit, buy.download_count HAVING max(cash.cashuse_date) = (select max(cash.cashuse_date) from bbu_cashuse cash)
